pullRequest.body:
This is the other end of https://github.com/leanprover-community/batteries/pull/958.

Again, we'll need to make sure the token used here can post comments at Batteries.

#### Declarations diff

<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash

## more verbose report:
```

</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.
I've given the corresponding bot account the permissions on Batteries required to post comments.
